vialab.simpleMultiTouch.events

Class HSwipeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.events.TuioEvent
      • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.events.HSwipeEvent

  • public class HSwipeEvent
extends TuioEvent
    Holds the information associated with a horizontal swipe event.

    University of Ontario Institute of Technology. Summer Research Assistant with Dr. Christopher Collins (Summer 2011) collaborating with Dr. Mark Hancock.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Erik Paluka

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HSwipeEvent(int x, int y, long[] cursors, int swipeType)
      Calls the constructor of TuioEvent and passes it the event's coordinates and the cursors associated with the event.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the type of swipe

    • Constructor Detail

      • HSwipeEvent

        public HSwipeEvent(int x,
           int y,
           long[] cursors,
           int swipeType)
        Calls the constructor of TuioEvent and passes it the event's coordinates and the cursors associated with the event.
        Parameters:
        x - int - The event's x-coordinate
        y - int - The event's y-coordinate
        cursors - long[] - The cursors associated with the event (their session IDs)
        swipeType - int - The direction of the swipe -> -1 for left swipe, 1 for right swipe

    • Method Detail

      • getSwipeType

        public int getSwipeType()
        Returns the type of swipe
        Returns:
        swipeType, -1 for left swipe, 1 for right swipe
